songs.title: Shoot Again
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
No one knows how I feel today
But everybody knows what I'm going to do
The girl in black or the girl in red
You know this night I will shot again
I like to drink two beers before
A shot of tequila and a shot of rum
No girlfriend and no rules today
You know this night I will shot, shot, shot again

[Chorus]
I will shot again!
I will shot again!
I will shot again!

[Verse 2]
No one knows how I feel today
But everybody knows what I'm going to do
The girl in black or the girl in red
You know this night I will shot again
I like to drink two beers before
A shot of tequila and a shot of rum
No girlfriend and no rules today
You know this night I will shot, shot, shot again

Shot, shot, shot again

[Chorus]
I will shot again!
I will shot again!
I will shot again!

[Outro]
I will shot
I...will...shot
I will shot again!
I...will...shot
I will shot again!
I...will...shot
I will shot again!
I...will...shot, shot, shot
I will shot again!
